-- | Happstack backend for the digestive-functors library
--   
@package digestive-functors-happstack
@version 0.6.1.1


-- | Module providing a happstack backend for the digestive-functors
--   library
module Text.Digestive.Happstack

-- | Runs a form with the HTTP input provided by Happstack.
--   
--   Automatically picks between <a>getForm</a> and <a>postForm</a> based
--   on the request method.
runForm :: (HasRqData m, Monad m, ServerMonad m) => Text -> Form v m a -> m (View v, Maybe a)
